attributes.action: SCRAP THE LAW PROHIBITING THE INCITEMENT TO RELIGIOUS HATRED
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am opposed to this recently passed law as it restricts free speech. The law is an attempt to curb what people think and reinforces the Big Brother vision George Orwell forsaw in the UK. I believe everyone should have the right to COMPLETE FREEDOM OF SPEECH. This law will curb religious freedom of speech and is a constraint on conscience. It will destroy tolerance between people of different faiths or of no faith. It will weaken religious observance in this society.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters in the main sentence, it makes the text hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
